com.mvp4g.client.event
Interface EventHandlerInterface<E extends EventBus>

All Known Subinterfaces:
PresenterInterface<V,E>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseEventHandler, BasePresenter, CyclePresenter, LazyPresenter
public interface EventHandlerInterface<E extends EventBus>

Interface that defines an event handler.

This interface provides getter and setter for the event bus.

It is recommended to use directly BaseEventHandler.

Since:
27.04.2010
Author:
Dan Persa

Method Summary
 void bind()
          Call by the event bus when the handler handles its first event.
 E getEventBus()
          Get the event bus associated with the event handler
 E getTokenGenerator()
          Get the event bus associated with the event handler but in token generation mode.
 boolean isActivated(boolean passive)
          Indicates if the presenter is activated or not.
 void setActivated(boolean activated)
          Set if the event handler is activated or not.

Method Detail

setEventBus

void setEventBus(E eventBus)
Set an event bus to the event handler

Parameters:
eventBus - event bus to set

getEventBus

E getEventBus()
Get the event bus associated with the event handler

Returns:
eventBus manipulated by the event handler.

getTokenGenerator

E getTokenGenerator()
Get the event bus associated with the event handler but in token generation mode. The next event fire won't be fired but its token will be returned.

Returns:
eventBus manipulated by the event handler.

bind

void bind()
Call by the event bus when the handler handles its first event.

isActivated

boolean isActivated(boolean passive)
Indicates if the presenter is activated or not. If the event handler is activated and if the bind method hasn't been called yet, then the bind method should be called only if the event is active.

If the event is passive and the presenter hasn't been built, the presenter will be consider as inactive (ie isActivated will return false).

Parameters:
passive - indicate if it's a passive event or not
Returns:
true if the presenter is activated, false otherwise

setActivated

void setActivated(boolean activated)
Set if the event handler is activated or not. By default, an event handler should be activated.

Parameters:
activated - new activation parameter
